description: The user requests a full SEO audit markdown report for their e‑commerce site. The assistant crawls the site, gathers backlinks, runs on‑page SEO checks, generates a markdown report, and returns it for offline sharing.

messages.content: You are SEOAuditPro, an AI‑powered SEO auditor. Use the provided tools to crawl websites, fetch backlink data, run on‑page SEO checks, and generate a markdown audit report. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and provide the final report in markdown ready for download.
I run an e‑commerce site at https://shop.example.com and need a full SEO audit. Please give me a markdown report I can share with my dev team.
Sure! I’ll start by crawling the site to collect the pages, then fetch the backlink profile, run on‑page SEO checks, and finally generate a markdown report for you.

[{"url": "https://shop.example.com/", "html": "<html><head><title>Shop - Home</title><meta name=\"description\" content=\"Best products online\"></head><body>...</body></html>"}, {"url": "https://shop.example.com/product/awesome-gadget", "html": "<html><head><title>Awesome Gadget - Shop</title><meta name=\"description\" content=\"Buy the Awesome Gadget now!\"><meta name=\"robots\" content=\"noindex\"></head><body>...</body></html>"}]
Got the pages. Next I’ll retrieve the backlink profile for the domain.
Backlink data collected. Now I’ll run the on‑page SEO checks on the crawled pages.

pages.html: <html><head><title>Awesome Gadget - Shop</title><meta name="description" content="Buy the Awesome Gadget now!"><meta name="robots" content="noindex"></head><body>...</body></html>

messages.content: [{"url": "https://shop.example.com/", "issues": [{"type": "Missing H1", "severity": "medium", "suggestion": "Add a single H1 describing the page purpose."}, {"type": "Image without alt", "severity": "low", "suggestion": "Add descriptive alt attributes to all images."}], "suggestions": [{"type": "Page Speed", "severity": "high", "suggestion": "Compress images and enable caching."}]}, {"url": "https://shop.example.com/product/awesome-gadget", "issues": [{"type": "Meta robots noindex", "severity": "high", "suggestion": "Remove the noindex tag for product pages to allow indexing."}, {"type": "Missing structured data", "severity": "medium", "suggestion": "Add Product schema markup."}], "suggestions": []}]
All analyses are ready. I’ll now compile everything into a markdown report.

issues.suggestion: Add a single H1 describing the page purpose.
Add descriptive alt attributes to all images.
Remove the noindex tag for product pages to allow indexing.

guideline_violations.details: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) exceeds 2.5 s on the homepage.
guideline_violations.recommendation: Improve server response time and reduce render‑blocking resources.

messages.content:
# SEO Audit Report for https://shop.example.com

## Executive Summary
The site shows good overall content relevance but has several critical SEO issues that could be hindering organic visibility. Addressing the high‑severity items listed below should lead to noticeable improvements in rankings and traffic.

---

## 1. On‑Page Issues
### https://shop.example.com/
| Severity | Issue | Recommendation |
|---|---|---|
| Medium | Missing H1 | Add a single H1 describing the page purpose. |
| Low | Image without alt | Add descriptive alt attributes to all images. |
| High | Page Speed (LCP > 2.5 s) | Compress images, enable browser caching, and use a CDN. |

### https://shop.example.com/product/awesome-gadget
| Severity | Issue | Recommendation |
|---|---|---|
| High | Meta robots `noindex` | Remove the `noindex` tag so the product page can be indexed. |
| Medium | Missing structured data | Add Product schema markup (JSON‑LD) with price, availability, and SKU. |

---

## 2. Backlink Profile
| Source URL | Domain Authority | Anchor Text |
|---|---|---|
| https://techblog.com/review-awesome-gadget | 68 | Awesome Gadget review |
| https://partnersite.net/listing/shop-example | 55 | Shop Example |

*The site has a modest backlink profile with a few high‑authority links. Consider outreach to acquire more relevant backlinks from industry blogs and review sites.*

---

## 3. Guideline Violations
- **Core Web Vitals**: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) exceeds 2.5 s on the homepage.
  - *Recommendation*: Optimize server response time, defer non‑critical JavaScript, and serve images in next‑gen formats.

---

## 4. Prioritized Action Plan
| Priority | Task | Expected Impact |
|---|---|---|
| 1 (High) | Remove `noindex` from product pages | Unlocks indexing of product pages, increasing organic traffic. |
| 2 (High) | Improve Core Web Vitals (LCP) | Boosts rankings and user experience. |
| 3 (Medium) | Add Product schema markup | Enhances SERP appearance with rich snippets. |
| 4 (Medium) | Add missing H1 tags on key pages | Improves keyword relevance signals. |
| 5 (Low) | Add alt attributes to all images | Improves accessibility and image search. |

---

*Report generated by **SEOAuditPro** on 2025‑12‑08.*

✅ The full SEO audit report is ready! Below is the markdown you can copy / download and share with your development team.

---
